  proposition: Kai Zhang and colleagues published BiomedGPT, a unified biomedical generative pre-trained transformer for vision, language, and multimodal tasks in 2023.
    entity-attribute relationships:
    Kai Zhang|PUBLISHED|BiomedGPT
    BiomedGPT|YEAR|2023
    BiomedGPT|DESCRIBED_BY|unified biomedical generative pre-trained transformer
    BiomedGPT|SUPPORTS|vision tasks
    BiomedGPT|SUPPORTS|language tasks
    BiomedGPT|SUPPORTS|multimodal tasks

    entity-entity relationships:
    Kai Zhang|DEVELOPED|BiomedGPT

  proposition: Zhengliang Liu and team developed Deid-GPT, a zero-shot medical text de-identification tool using GPT-4 in 2023.
    entity-attribute relationships:
    Deid-GPT|YEAR|2023
    Deid-GPT|DESCRIBED_BY|zero-shot medical text de-identification tool
    Deid-GPT|USES|GPT-4

    entity-entity relationships:
    Zhengliang Liu|DEVELOPED|Deid-GPT

  proposition: Yizhen Luo and researchers created BiomedGPT, an open multimodal generative pre-trained transformer for biomedicine in 2023.
    entity-attribute relationships:
    BiomedGPT|YEAR|2023
    BiomedGPT|DESCRIBED_BY|open multimodal generative pre-trained transformer
    BiomedGPT|DOMAIN|biomedicine

    entity-entity relationships:
    Yizhen Luo|CREATED|BiomedGPT

  proposition: T Guo and colleagues surveyed Large Language Model based Multi-Agents, discussing progress and challenges for the 33rd International Joint Conference on Artificial Intelligence in 2024.
    entity-attribute relationships:
    Survey|YEAR|2024
    Survey|TOPIC|Large Language Model based Multi-Agents
    Survey|DISCUSSED|progress
    Survey|DISCUSSED|challenges

    entity-entity relationships:
    T Guo|CONDUCTED|Survey

  proposition: Xiao Liu and team developed AgentBench for evaluating Large Language Models as agents in 2023.
    entity-attribute relationships:
    AgentBench|YEAR|2023
    AgentBench|PURPOSE|evaluating Large Language Models as agents

    entity-entity relationships:
    Xiao Liu|DEVELOPED|AgentBench

  proposition: Yue Huang and researchers created the MetaTool Benchmark to help Large Language Models decide whether and which tools to use in 2023.
    entity-attribute relationships:
    MetaTool Benchmark|YEAR|2023
    MetaTool Benchmark|PURPOSE|help Large Language Models decide tools

    entity-entity relationships:
    Yue Huang|CREATED|MetaTool Benchmark

  proposition: Ian Goodfellow and colleagues introduced generative adversarial nets in 2014.
    entity-attribute relationships:
    Generative Adversarial Nets|YEAR|2014

    entity-entity relationships:
    Ian Goodfellow|INTRODUCED|Generative Adversarial Nets

  proposition: Diederik P Kingma proposed auto-encoding variational Bayes in 2013.
    entity-attribute relationships:
    Auto-encoding Variational Bayes|YEAR|2013

    entity-entity relationships:
    Diederik P Kingma|PROPOSED|Auto-encoding Variational Bayes

  proposition: Ling Yang and team published a comprehensive survey of diffusion models and their methods and applications in 2023.
    entity-attribute relationships:
    Survey|YEAR|2023
    Survey|TOPIC|diffusion models
    Survey|COVERS|methods
    Survey|COVERS|applications

    entity-entity relationships:

  proposition: Wayne Xin Zhao and colleagues conducted a survey of large language models in 2023.
    entity-attribute relationships:
    Survey|YEAR|2023
    Survey|TOPIC|large language models

    entity-entity relationships:
    Wayne Xin Zhao|CONDUCTED|Survey

  proposition: Jacob Devlin and researchers developed BERT, a deep bidirectional transformer for language understanding in 2018.
    entity-attribute relationships:
    BERT|YEAR|2018
    BERT|DESCRIBED_BY|deep bidirectional transformer
    BERT|PURPOSE|language understanding

    entity-entity relationships:
    Jacob Devlin|DEVELOPED|BERT

  proposition: Yinhan Liu created RoBERTa, a robustly optimized BERT pretraining approach in 2019.
    entity-attribute relationships:
    RoBERTa|YEAR|2019
    RoBERTa|DESCRIBED_BY|robustly optimized BERT pretraining approach

    entity-entity relationships:
    Yinhan Liu|CREATED|RoBERTa

  proposition: Iz Beltagy and team developed SciBERT, a pre-trained language model for scientific text in 2019.
    entity-attribute relationships:
    SciBERT|YEAR|2019
    SciBERT|DESCRIBED_BY|pre-trained language model
    SciBERT|DOMAIN|scientific text

    entity-entity relationships:
    Iz Beltagy|DEVELOPED|SciBERT

  proposition: Alec Radford and colleagues improved language understanding through generative pre-training in 2018.
    entity-attribute relationships:
    Improvement|YEAR|2018
    Improvement|DOMAIN|language understanding
    Improvement|METHOD|generative pre-training

    entity-entity relationships:
    Alec Radford|IMPROVED|Language Understanding

  proposition: OpenAI released ChatGPT in 2023.

  proposition: Hugo Touvron and researchers developed LLaMA, open and efficient foundation language models in 2023.
    entity-attribute relationships:

    entity-entity relationships:
